attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Discrimination is the freedom to choose so when you stop discrimination you end the freedom to choose.Whatever freedoms we have left are fast declining so end it now.It is the most perverse form of bullying legislation ever and is a favouritism law in favour of vested interest and bullying authorities as well as bullying minorities.It is anti-democracy at its worst.End it now!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
